channel.title: Chaging the way the npc faces
channel.description:
How do u change the way the npc is facing. i know how to change the way objects face but i cant figure it out for NPCs i even took a pic to show u what i meant.
[img]http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/8172/facingle1.png[/img]
i want the npc to be facing the way i am
